info.title: Config API
info.description:
API for configuration of Hydrolix entities, like users, projects, tables, views, and transforms.

        - Contact URL: https://www.hydrolix.io.

        -  Terms Of Service: https://docs.hydrolix.io/legal/terms-of-service.

get.description:
Return a list of audit activities

**Permissions required**:
IsAuthenticated

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description:
Change direction of the query

* `asc` - asc
* `desc` - desc

parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: Search for user by ip_address.  Only available with query=hdx.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set. Default 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page. Default 100. Max 1000.

parameters.name: target_user_id
parameters.description: Search for user by target_user_id.  Only available with query=hdx.

parameters.name: target_username
parameters.description: Search for user by target_username. Only available with query=hdx.

Use this endpoint to log into Hydrolix and receive a JWT token for use with
           further calls. The username and password are passed in the body of the
           json request document. The document returned includes the organizations
           that the user belongs to as well as the access token

AllowAny
